de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.adapter.tnccs

Class TnccAdapterIetfLong

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.adapter.tnccs.TnccAdapterIetf
      • de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.adapter.tnccs.TnccAdapterIetfLong
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimc.AttributeSupport, org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimc.TNCC, org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimc.TNCCLong

     class TnccAdapterIetfLong
extends TnccAdapterIetf
implements org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimc.TNCCLong
    TNCC adapter according to IETF/TCG specifications. Implementing an IF-IMC TNCC interface with long addressing support.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimc.AttributeSupport
